SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM T_BOARD TB INNER JOIN MEM M ON TB.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO INNER JOIN TB_MANAGE TBM ON TB.TBM_NO = TBM.TBM_NO WHERE TB_DEL = 1 AND TBM_NM = '자유게시판'
AND MEM_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND TB_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'

SELECT TBM.TBM_NM, M.MEM_NM, M.MEM_NO, TO_CHAR(TB.TB_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TB_DT, TB.TB_HIT, TB.TB_TITLE, TB.TB_CON, TB.TB_FILE FROM T_BOARD TB INNER JOIN MEM M ON TB.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO INNER JOIN TB_MANAGE TBM ON TB.TBM_NO = TBM.TBM_NO WHERE TB_DEL = 1 AND TBM_NM = '자유게시판' AND TB_NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BOARD (TB_NO, MEM_NO, TBM_NO, TB_TITLE, TB_CON, TB_FILE) VALUES (T_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mno}, 1, #{title}, #{con}, #{tbfile})
